name: NPR
text:
Many law enforcement agencies in suburban Minneapolis and St. Paul that policed protests were the beneficiaries of a Pentagon program that distributed more than $1 billion worth of military gear to local police departments. 
https://t.co/UNe9zO3ceN

name: NPR
text:
In an April survey of nearly 500 Wisconsinites with disabilities and older adults, every respondent said COVID-19 has disrupted their caregiving service.

And the state was already facing a shortage of caregivers before the pandemic.
https://t.co/xsoaQL8pLa

name: NPR
text:
Lainy is a preschool teacher who's been out of work since mid-March.

Because preschool teachers are "chronically underpaid," she says, unemployment benefits add up to about $500 a month more than she made when she was working.
https://t.co/6zAUEgVK4q
